acceptance-test-run.title: 1. Open Notification Setting click check box enable
acceptance-test-run.name: 1. Open Notification Setting click check box enable

test-step.description: When I open submenu Notification Setting of parent menu Notification
Then The system should open 'Notification' page

test-group.name: And In Notification Setting screen, I click random checkbox in column enable

test-step.description: Then In Notification Setting screen, System show list button can not use | Add | | Delete |
And In Notification Setting screen, link View Notifications is Visible
And In Notification Setting screen, Table in the left have list select box can select | Branch | | Position | | Employee Name |
And In Notification Setting screen, Table in the right have 6 columns
And In Notification Setting screen, Table in the right have columns like below | Employee Code | | Employee Name | | Type | | Enable? | | Unread |
